Description: Magical gem; intaglio; brown-black jasper; oval; double bevelled edge; engraved on obverse: hawk wearing crown of Upper and Lower Egypt; man; inscribed on reverse.
Bibliographic references: Michel 2001 / Die Magischen Gemmen im Britischen Museum (21)
Bonner 1950 / Studies in magical amulets, chiefly Graeco-Egyptian
CBd / The Campbell Bonner Magical Gems Database Online (400) (http://classics.mfab.hu/talismans/cbd/400)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: G326 (Burns Gnostic Gem Number)
Other BM number: OA.9802 (Registration number and/or Big number reinstated in 2023)
